chapter.text: You walk towards the bleachers, unease builds with each step. ^1500You peek underneath and see a pool of blood underneath it. ^1500You gag and take a few steps back without a second thought. ^1500Blood never bothered you like that, but you guess itâ€™s different when it's your own. ^1500 at least you think it is. ^1500 you hope it is.
